Name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2
About the game: At Blacklands Manor Orphanage, three toys arrive in a donation box for Esther and her two friends Molly and Isaac. They call the tiger toy Mr. Stripes , the panda toy Miss Bo and the rabbit toy Mr. Hopp . Not long after, Molly and Isaac disappear and a mystery begins to unravel around the three toys, as well as a dark history of the town of Blacklands. A Survival-Horror 2D side scroller pixel art experience, the prequel story to Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 1.
